Articles.Content:
I've seen several very neat designs that involve two layers of fuselage, stacked on top of and heavily clipped into each other.  How is this accomplished?  I can't find any way to attach a fuselage to a fuselage, except end to end.

Thanks
What part are you using as a fuselage?
I don't have KSP handy, but any of the standard parts you'd use to build a plane...the fuel tanks, open cargo sections, or cockpits.
Fuel tanks attach radially just perfect, you can fine tune them with the offset tool.
Stack mk2 or mk3 fuel tanks on top of each other, place the passenger modules on them, and clip. Or use Decouplers, just don't Decouple them.
